title: New account, can't make clubs???
body: Anyone know what the seemingly hidden requirement is?

replies.body: I don't think you do need a certain level to create a club. Try refreshing your client really quickly if you happened to level up really fast, and shoot me a screenshot of what it looks like if you still can't click on clubs.
Like the "Clubs" option under "Profile" is completely grayed out and unclickable
